references.paper_title: Flow network based generative models for non-iterative diverse candidate generation
references.reason: This paper introduces GFlowNets, the core methodology of the current work.

references.paper_title: Trajectory balance: Improved credit assignment in gflownets
references.reason: This paper introduces a key training objective (Trajectory Balance) used for GFNs in the current work.
This paper extends GFNs to multi-objective settings, and introduces techniques used in the current work.

references.paper_title: Generative flow networks as entropy-regularized rl
references.reason: This paper establishes a connection between GFNs and reinforcement learning, which is exploited in the current work.
This paper introduces Q-learning, a core RL algorithm used in the current work.
